# Test Fixtures

This directory contains test files used by Playwright E2E tests.

## Required Files

### sample-cv.pdf
A sample CV PDF file for testing the upload and optimization workflow.

You need to add a real PDF file here. You can:

1. Use any real CV PDF (remove personal info)
2. Create a simple test PDF with text content
3. Copy an existing CV and anonymize it

The PDF should contain:
- Name and contact information
- Work experience
- Education
- Skills
- Basic CV structure

## File Naming

- `sample-cv.pdf` - Main test file for workflow tests
- Add additional test files as needed with descriptive names

## Privacy Note

Make sure all test PDFs contain only sample data and no real personal information.
